basics.name: Richard Hendriks
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary:
**Richard** hails from Tulsa. He has earned degrees from the University of Oklahoma and Stanford. (Go Sooners and Cardinal!) Before starting Pied Piper, he worked for Hooli as a part time software developer.

While his work focuses on applied information theory, mostly optimizing lossless compression schema of both the length-limited and adaptive variants, his non-work interests range widely, everything from quantum computing to chaos theory. He could tell you about it, but THAT would NOT be a “length-limited” conversation!

work.name: Pied Piper
work.summary: [Pied Piper](http://piedpiper.example.com) is a multi-platform technology based on a proprietary universal compression algorithm that has consistently fielded high Weisman Scores™ that are not merely competitive, but approach the theoretical limit of lossless compression.
highlights: Build an algorithm for artist to detect if their music was violating copy right infringement laws
Optimized an algorithm that holds the current world record for Weisman Scores

work.name: Fantasy Inc.
work.summary:
Fantasy Inc. is a magical technology company that specializes in creating illusions and bringing dreams to life. Their proprietary technology has consistently amazed people and earned high praise.

- Created a spell that turns pumpkins into carriages
- Won the Wizard's Choice Award at the annual Magic Convention
- Developed a potion that grants eternal youth

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.
Non-profit organization dedicated to teaching children how to code.
highlights: Developed curriculum for beginners to advanced students
Mentored a team of students who won a national coding competition

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

publications.name: Audio compression for Virtual Reality
publications.summary: Revolutionary compression technology that enhances the audio experience in virtual reality.

skills.name: Web Development
skills.summary: Experience with Matlab, Blender, Solidworks, Unity, Python, Java, C, C++, CSS, Javascript, HTML, Adobe Premiere for VR film, Adobe Photoshop; with eagerness to keep improving and learning new technologies

skills.name: UI Design
skills.summary: Highly skilled in UI design with a strong understanding of design principles, user experience, and industry-standard tools. Proficient in creating visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces for web and mobile applications.

languages.summary: Proficient in English with a pretty good level of speaking, writing and comprehension abilities. Able to effectively communicate ideas and understand complex information in both personal and professional settings. Demonstrates strong grammar skills and a broad vocabulary.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.

references.name: Laurie Bream
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Monica, her exceptional skills and talent were evident during her time at High-Tech Inc. I am confident that she will make a valuable impact at any organization she joins.

projects.name: Miss Direction
projects.description: A mapping engine that misguides you
highlights: Built by all women team of newbie programmers
Using modern technologies such as GoogleMaps, Chrome Extension and Javascript

projects.name: Lost in Space
projects.description: A cutting-edge navigation app that sends you on wild adventures
highlights: Won the Future Tech Award at the Space Symposium
Built by a team of skilled astronauts and engineers
Utilizes advanced technology such as Augmented Reality and AI

sideProjects.name: Warp Drive
sideProjects.description: A futuristic spaceship that travels faster than light
